Text: I up'ed Glitter for you Riverburn.  By any chance do you have a copy of Point Break, I'd love to buy the Rifftrax for that one

thanks man, i already have point break synced...but i didn't like how it turned out so i haven't uploaded it, unfortunately i've deleted the movie and now i have to find it again. i'm not too interested in point break but i'll do it as a favour to you because of the glitter riff :)
Many thanks
Not sure whats going on but I'm getting a Problem Connecting to Tracker Error, and Im the one seeding this so not sure how to fix this problem
So whats the next Riff you'd like me to get?

you make it sound like i'm forcing you to buy them...which ain't the case :)
if you want, you can try with the fantastic four ntsc rifftrax, grey's anatomy...and that's all.
thank u
If you DL, donate a few bucks to RiffTrax.  There is a button on the home page
